title: C/C++/C#
content: Heh, looks like another one of those "I have an idea, someone make it for me" posts. Interesting concept, though... hopefully something interesting will come of it.

title: Re: C/C++/C#
content:
I don't know much about teams of people working on 1 project (and an unpaid, free one at that), but I'm going to take a shot in the dark and say that assembling that big of a team doesn't happen so easily. It seems that he's just expecting people to join up. I myself would be very wary, I mean, who just signs up to a big team to do w/e the boss says? I could be wrong tho, but I would be surprised to see that project get half done, let alone the team completed. Sounds too difficult to keep together."Out of curiosity, what is that score in the Earth measurement system?" The official searched through his papers momentarily.
"...That would be three hundred fifteen."
"Three hundred fifteen... This person must be the most intelligent being throughout the entire Universe." No one in the room had any immediate comment.
